statements: SELECT * FROM content_metadata;
SELECT content_id, content_name, content_type FROM content_metadata WHERE is_published = TRUE;
SELECT content_name, content_description FROM content_metadata ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_name, content_type FROM content_metadata WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT content_name, content_type FROM content_metadata WHERE content_type = 'Blog' AND is_published = TRUE ORDER BY content_name ASC;
SELECT content_id, content_name, content_type FROM content_metadata WHERE is_published = TRUE ORDER BY publish_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM content_metadata WHERE content_type = 'Article' AND content_description LIKE '%tutorial%'
SELECT content_id, content_name, content_type, publish_date FROM content_metadata WHERE publish_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT content_name, content_type FROM content_metadata WHERE content_type IN ('Video', 'Podcast') ORDER BY content_name ASC
SELECT content_id, content_name, content_description FROM content_metadata WHERE content_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY content_name DESC
SELECT * FROM content_metadata WHERE id = 1;
SELECT content_title, content_description FROM content_metadata WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, content_title, created_at FROM content_metadata ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM app_users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM app_users WHERE app_id = 3;
SELECT id, content_title, content_description FROM content_metadata WHERE id = 1;
SELECT app_id, content_title FROM content_metadata WHERE app_id = 3 ORDER BY app_id DESC;
SELECT content_title, content_description FROM content_metadata WHERE content_title LIKE '%example%' AND content_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT app_id, username, email FROM app_users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, app_id, content_title, created_at FROM content_metadata WHERE id > 5 AND app_id <= 10 ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM ContentMetadata;
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_type FROM ContentMetadata WHERE content_type = 'Article';
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_description FROM ContentMetadata WHERE content_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, email, role FROM Users ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, content_title FROM Users JOIN UserContent ON Users.user_id = UserContent.user_id JOIN ContentMetadata ON UserContent.content_id = ContentMetadata.content_id;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT content_title, content_type FROM ContentMetadata WHERE content_type = 'movie';
SELECT u.username, c.content_title FROM Users u JOIN UserContent uc ON u.user_id = uc.user_id JOIN ContentMetadata c ON uc.content_id = c.content_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(*) AS num_content FROM Users u JOIN UserContent uc ON u.user_id = uc.user_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT u.username, c.content_title, uc.access_timestamp FROM Users u JOIN UserContent uc ON u.user_id = uc.user_id JOIN ContentMetadata c ON uc.content_id = c.content_id WHERE u.role = 'editor';
SELECT * FROM ContentMetadata;
SELECT content_name, author, publish_date FROM ContentMetadata WHERE content_type = 'Article';
SELECT content_id, author, publish_date FROM ContentMetadata ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT content_name, content_type FROM ContentMetadata WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT user_id, content_id, progress_percentage FROM UserProgress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT content_id, content_name, author FROM ContentMetadata WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY author DESC
SELECT user_id, progress_percentage FROM UserProgress WHERE progress_percentage >= 50 ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating = 5 ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT setting_id, setting_name FROM AppSettings WHERE setting_name LIKE '%color%'
SELECT content_id, content_type, author, publish_date FROM ContentMetadata INNER JOIN UserFeedback ON ContentMetadata.content_id = UserFeedback.content_id
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, name, email FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT title, author FROM ContentMetadata WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_id, material_type, file_location FROM CourseMaterials;
SELECT tag_name FROM ContentTags WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ContentMetadata;
SELECT title, author, creation_date FROM ContentMetadata WHERE author IS NOT NULL;
SELECT c.title, t.tag_name FROM ContentMetadata c JOIN ContentTags t ON c.content_id = t.content_id;
SELECT s.name, s.email, c.title, c.creation_date FROM Students s JOIN ContentMetadata c ON s.student_id = c.content_id;
SELECT c.title, c.creation_date, ci.interaction_type, ci.timestamp FROM ContentMetadata c JOIN ContentInteractions ci ON c.content_id = ci.content_id;
